data.title: Kindle Categories
data.meta_description: Kindle US category: 'Books > Romance'. Writer's Average Monthly Sales Revenue: $271,469. Average Book price: $5. Amazon Best seller rank: 5
data.text:
Default search mode looks for fields matching at least one keyword match:

Eg. Science Fiction looks for fields matching either science OR fiction

Use quotes to search for literal phrases:

Eg. "Business Culture"

Use - sign to exclude keywords from a particular field:

Eg. business -marketing

Use OR and AND (in big letters) between keywords to refine results:

Eg. romance AND medieval

Eg. finance OR marketing

Use * sign for wildcard search:

Eg. bio*

Eg. fantasy AND pr*cesses
